column5: I am looking for a good outboard mechanic in the Hamilton area,does anybody know of one??  Thanks in advance  Chance
Bay City Marine, Hestor Street, Hamilton.
+1 on Bay City, as well Maximum Marine on Hwy 2 past the Tims and Wendys plaza toward Brantford.
Maximum marine,tell him harvey sent ya!LOL
Thanks guys I will give them a call!!
Yep, Bay City Marine. I've been dealing with them for 30 years for both outboard parts as well as outboard repairs I couldn't tackle myself.
I 2nd Bay City Marine... Great Guys
Maximum Marine is great.  They tend to be more reasonably priced as well.
Hmmm took a look at the Maximum Marine site and see they are only a couple of minutes away from me.  Thanks guys
